text: neighbors knew the couple in the small
flat in a quiet street as Laura and
Thomas but nobody suspected their grim
secret it was just the latest town
the latest identity in the 10 years
police say the girl snatched as a
teenager had been kept against her will
forced to marry an to bear a child
Isidro Garcia is accused of kidnap false
imprisonment rape and indecent acts
against a child ten years ago he lived
here with his girlfriend and her 15 year
old child police allege that after
beating his partner up he drugged and
kidnapped the girl he changed her name
um usually the middle name date of birth
so they could get married there's a lot
of things that he he had control of her
life but then she walked into this
police station to tell her story after
connecting with her sister on Facebook
and realizing the family had not as she
believed abandoned her we are not
identifying the woman who's now 25 but
this is a photograph with her baby taken
by a neighbor invited round for a first
birthday party this was in church Garcia
next to their baby his wife on the far
right they were well known in the
neighborhood as a normal couple she
didn't seem like someone who was under
pressure or you know being held against
her will or anything and then being also
like I said at almost 25 she should you
know had a sense of I can escape if I
want to you know I mean I can leave I'm
she's not kept on watched 24/7 so it's a
little weird to think that you know she
didn't just leave we step out have
conversations she always steps out she
goes back inside her house like I said
he doesn't let her socialize but then in
another way like they act like a more
well you know here and then the kiss in
front of people but it's just all very
weird and crazy to me what's strange is
that she clearly wasn't being held
captive in this top floor apartment the
neighbors knew her knew them as a couple
even went to the house for parties she
contacted her sister on Facebook she
walked into the police station to tell
her own story clearly the man who held
her had a real power and control over
her for 10 years
Alistair Leith had BBC news in
California
